page.title: 03CARSE GRAY ESTATE : WILDLIFE
page.content: ON CARSE GRAY ESTATE THERE IS A LOT OF WILDLIFE. SOME CREATURES CAUSE A LOT OF DAMAGE WHILE A FEW ARE SOMETIMES A GREAT HELP TO FARMERS.FOR INSTANCE FOXES KILL RABBITS WHICH HAVE BECOME A GREAT PEST TO FARMERS IN THIS AREA. ON THE ESTATE CAN BE SEEN : { {WEASELS, STOATS AND HEDGEHOGS, AND MORE RARELY : {ROE DEER, FOXES AND RED SQUIRRELS.} THE BIRDLIFE INCLUDES: {PHEASANTS, PIGEONS, {MALLARDS, MOORHENS, SEAGULLS}AND THE OCCASIONAL{HAWK.} RABBITS CAUSE IMMENSE DAMAGE TO CROPS,DEER NIP OFF THE TOPS OF YOUNG TREES TO MARK OUT THEIR TERRITORY AND FOXES AND CARRION CROWS WILL KILL LAMBS. SOME SHOOTING AND TRAPPING IS ALLOWED TO KEEP DOWN THEIR NUMBERS.
